participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and creative, enjoys making food that brings joy.
participant_1.background: I love to make tasty carrot soup in my spare time. I love comic books. I prefer winter over fall. I would like to learn how to train my dogs to behave better. I like music that is upbeat and energetic, so I can keep my spirits up while I'm on bed rest.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Artistic and reflective, enjoys sports and has a fondness for vintage aesthetics.
participant_2.background: I am proud of creating beautiful flower arrangements that make people smile. I broke my nose in 5th grade. I took my black car to the desert and drove as fast as I could. I am a Canadian who loves basketball, vintage clothing and my home. I find that reading about the history of the world and its philosophy helps me put my own troubles into perspective.

content.text: not much. just got back from the doctor.
i just had a check up.
oh okay. well i'm glad you're okay.
so, what are you up to today?
i'm going to go home and make some carrot soup.
that sounds delicious! i love carrot soup.
me too! i'm going to make some with homemade croutons.
that sounds amazing. i'm going to have to try that sometime.
you should! it's super easy to make.
i'm sure i could do it. i'm pretty good at cooking.
awesome! i'm sure you'll love it.
well, i have to go now. it was nice talking to you.
you too! take care of yourself.
